legend.span: 17a. How is HIV transmitted?
**MARK ALL MENTIONED, DO NOT READ OUT**

label.span: Contact/ exposure to HIV infected blood

legend.span: 17b. How can people prevent contracting or transmitting HIV?
**DO NOT READ, MARK ALL MENTIONED**

label.span: Remain faithful to uninfected partner/ Ask partner to be faithful
Avoid sex with people with many partners
Avoid sex with people who inject drugs
Avoid sex with people who had blood transfusion
Avoid sex with people suffering from an STI

label.span: **_Interviewer_: Now, I am going to ask you questions on who usually takes the decisions in your interactions with clients. Remember that everything you say here is confidential and nobody will know it is you who gave the answers. If you feel uncomfortable answering certain questions, you can always refuse to answer them.**

legend.span: 39a. Have you ever refused a client to have sex with you because he did not want to use a condom?
